name: histograph-relationizer
description: UI for creating relations between Histograph PITs

scripts.start: node relationizer-config.js > config.json && watchify -d -t reactify src/index.js -o dist/bundle.js & serve
scripts.develop: node relationizer-config.js > config.json && watchify -d -t reactify src/index.js & serve

author: Bert Spaan
